endpoints.description: Initiate matchmaking to pair users for multiplayer gaming sessions.
Retrieve the leaderboard for a specified game, including player scores and rankings.
Process transactions for in-game purchases and currency exchanges.
Retrieve statistical information about a player's performance across games.
Create a new game session accessible by multiple participants.
Fetch the detailed information and configuration of a specified game.
Remove a player's data from the system upon request.
Record a player's achievements during gameplay into the system.
Update user-specific settings and customization preferences.
Access detailed API documentation and usage instructions.
